name: Experiment B
description:
You play as a genetically engineered booger being tested by her creators. You also play as the scientists, constructing platforms for her to traverse. (fullscreen recommended)

CONTROLS:

Build Mode:

    -Left click to place a platform

    -Right click a platform to remove it

    -Press Space to enter play mode and unpause

Play Mode:

    -Left and right arrow keys to roll around

    -Up arrow to jump

    -Space to reset and enter build mode again

A game by Sumner, Hugo, Anthony, and Curtis

SFX from zapspalt.com and soundbible.com

Music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com/
